# dokploy_user_permissions (Resource)

Manages user permissions for an organization member in Dokploy. Note: Owner permissions cannot be modified.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `member_id` (String) The organization membership ID of the user whose permissions to manage. Use the 'member_id' from dokploy_user or dokploy_users data sources.

### Optional

- `accessed_environments` (List of String) List of environment IDs the user has access to. Defaults to empty list.
- `accessed_projects` (List of String) List of project IDs the user has access to. Defaults to empty list.
- `accessed_services` (List of String) List of service IDs the user has access to. Defaults to empty list.
- `can_access_to_api` (Boolean) Whether the user can access the API. Defaults to false.
- `can_access_to_docker` (Boolean) Whether the user can access Docker. Defaults to false.
- `can_access_to_git_providers` (Boolean) Whether the user can access Git providers. Defaults to false.
- `can_access_to_ssh_keys` (Boolean) Whether the user can access SSH keys. Defaults to false.
- `can_access_to_traefik_files` (Boolean) Whether the user can access Traefik files. Defaults to false.
- `can_create_environments` (Boolean) Whether the user can create environments. Defaults to false.
- `can_create_projects` (Boolean) Whether the user can create projects. Defaults to false.
- `can_create_services` (Boolean) Whether the user can create services. Defaults to false.
- `can_delete_environments` (Boolean) Whether the user can delete environments. Defaults to false.
- `can_delete_projects` (Boolean) Whether the user can delete projects. Defaults to false.
- `can_delete_services` (Boolean) Whether the user can delete services. Defaults to false.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier (same as member_id).
